Stardew Valley

Farming-life sim with cozy vibes and surprising depth.

Tesla vs Platform comparison

Tesla version

  • Available in Tesla Arcade
  • Core game loop suited to short tasks.
  • Controller required: Yes
  • Local co-op: No
  • Great controller support.
  • Parked play only.

Where to buy / play at home

  • Green Man Gaming
  • Fanatical
  • GOG
  • Humble Store
  • Amazon (Switch / eShop code)
  • Steam
  • Microsoft Store
PlatformAvailableKey perks / differences
Tesla Yes Great controller support., Parked play only.
PC Yes Full content, mods (PC), Local & online co-op on PC
Xbox Yes Console co-op; cloud saves within Xbox
PlayStation Yes Console co-op; trophies
Switch Yes Portable farming; local co-op
Mobile Yes Touch controls; single-player

Cross-saves

  • Tesla → home export supported: No
  • No Tesla → home export.
  • Within the same platform/store, cloud saves sync (e.g., Steam Cloud).

Features

  • Local co-op: Yes
  • Online co-op (native): Yes
  • Controller recommended: Yes

Recommended hardware

  • xbox controller
  • ps5 dualsense
  • usb hub

Notes

  • PC supports modding; easiest co-op setup on Steam.
